com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions

Class DataFromResourceStoringOperations<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sunrise.common.sessions.DataFromResourceStoringOperations<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Class of the stored object
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceStoringOperations<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CartInSession, CustomerInSession, OrderInSession

    public abstract class DataFromResourceStoringOperations<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceStoringOperations<T>
    Allows to store only some selected parts of information derived from the object, in opposite to the whole object. This might come in handy when the object contains sensible or unused data, it is too large or different data requires different storing strategies (e.g. save the cart ID in session and the mini cart in the session cache).

      • store

        public void store(@Nullable
                  T value)
        Stores the object, replacing it if a previous version already existed. If the value is null, it removes the object instead.
        Specified by:
        store in interface ResourceStoringOperations<T>
        Parameters:
        value - the instance of the object used to update the stored data, or null to remove all data
